item.text: Why doesn't FedWiki have a better way for us to be updated when someone forks our stuff?
(Mike said it would open up spam issues; but still; I hate my wordpress spam but I love my notifications!)
Mike said it would open up spam issues; but still; I hate my wordpress spam but I love my notifications!
Mike says eventually it will. But we're going to see how much community we can make without it.
Why take the spam chance when we don't know for sure that we need it.
